analysis.overview: Trident is a lightweight agent orchestration runtime for building multi-agent workflows with DAG-based execution. It enables declarative composition of prompt nodes and autonomous agent nodes (via Claude Agent SDK) with conditional routing, data mapping between nodes, and support for tools and MCP servers.

core_modules.name: executor.py
core_modules.purpose: DAG execution engine - orchestrates node execution, manages traces, handles checkpointing, and coordinates async agent execution

core_modules.name: project.py
core_modules.purpose: Project loading and manifest parsing - loads trident.yaml, validates structure, and creates Project objects with nodes/edges

core_modules.name: agents.py
core_modules.purpose: Agent node execution via Claude Agent SDK - enables multi-turn autonomous agents with tools, MCP servers, and usage tracking

core_modules.name: parser.py
core_modules.purpose: Parser for .prompt files and YAML - handles frontmatter parsing, schema validation, and node definitions

core_modules.name: dag.py
core_modules.purpose: DAG construction and topological sorting - builds execution graphs from edges and validates cycles

core_modules.name: conditions.py
core_modules.purpose: Conditional edge evaluation - supports Python expressions for dynamic routing between nodes

core_modules.name: template.py
core_modules.purpose: Jinja2 template rendering for prompts and variable substitution

core_modules.name: providers/
core_modules.purpose: LLM provider implementations (Anthropic, OpenAI) with unified completion interface

core_modules.name: tools/
core_modules.purpose: Tool execution framework - Python tool runner for agent nodes

public_api.load_project: Load a Trident project from directory containing trident.yaml
public_api.run: Execute a project's workflow DAG with inputs, returns ExecutionResult with trace
public_api.Project: Loaded project with nodes, edges, prompts, agents, and configuration
public_api.ExecutionResult: Result object with outputs, trace, checkpoint, success status
public_api.ExecutionTrace: Full execution history with per-node traces, tokens, costs
public_api.Checkpoint: Serializable execution state for resuming workflows

node_type_details.input: Entry point - defines schema for workflow inputs
node_type_details.output: Exit point - collects final outputs in JSON or text format
node_type_details.prompt: Single-turn LLM completion with template rendering
node_type_details.agent: Multi-turn autonomous agent with tools and MCP servers (requires trident[agents])
node_type_details.tool: Python function execution as a workflow node

key_features: Data mapping between nodes with Jinja2 templating
Agent nodes with Claude Agent SDK integration
Tool and MCP server support for agents

workflow_structure.manifest: trident.yaml - defines nodes, edges, mappings, and configuration
workflow_structure.prompts: prompts/*.prompt - frontmatter + template body for prompts/agents
workflow_structure.tools: Optional Python tools for agent nodes
